programmes.show_description: Latest news from the world of entertainment.
Surreal mystery comedy film starring Simon Pegg and Nick Frost, 2007. A hotshot young London cop is sent to a quiet rural posting but uncovers a seedy hotbed of murderous mayhem.
Solitary: American drama following the survivors of a plane crash. Sayid's life is placed in grave danger after he stumbles upon the source of the mysterious French transmission.
The latest news and reviews from the world of cars.
Your daily escape designed to calm the mind and encourage relaxation and reflection.
Shopping from home.
This programme brings you up to date with the latest action from the world of motorsport and features race coverage, insights, and behind-the-scenes footage from the best series.
Shopping from home.
Brian Moore and Jim Rosenthal present highlights from March 1981 as Ron Saunders' Aston Villa entertain Manchester City and Bobby Robson's Ipswich Town take on Tottenham Hotspur.
Brian Moore and Jim Rosenthal present football highlights from March 1981 as title-challenging Aston Villa visit White Hart Lane to take on a talented Tottenham Hotspur side.
Compulsion: Classic US action drama series. The rugged private investigator investigates a case involving his friend Carol as she prepares to testify against a man put behind bars.
A Long Way from Times Square: Classic US detective drama. Theo and Crocker head for a small Nevada town to bring a witness in a Mob trial back to New York, but it won't be easy...
Do Not Forsake Me: Classic drama. Ken finds he's taken on more than he bargained for when he is hired to help a man leave town, and Harry might be sitting on an ecological time bomb.
Country Boy: Regan and Carter are called in when alarm bells start ringing all over their patch. Who is setting them off - and why?
Judgement: Classic detective series. Dempsey shows Makepeace another side of his nature when her best friend is murdered, and the duo also investigate a man's kidnapping.
All for One - Part One: The first part of a two-part episode of the classic US action drama series. Thomas sets out to rescue old friend JJ Quincannon from Cambodia with Rick.
Money Back Guarantee: Classic US detective drama. Theo discovers that a series of car thefts are part of a scam where victims let their cars be stolen so they can claim insurance.
Arms and the Dog: Classic drama. Ken and Harry are on the trail of an amateur boxer who has deserted from the Army and a champion greyhound that has disappeared from its kennel.
Thou Shalt Not Kill: Regan and Carter are called to a siege at a bank, where two armed robbers are holding hostages.
Poetic Justice, Innit?: Comedy-drama series about a roguish entrepreneur and his bodyguard. Terry is left minding the fort when Arthur is called up for jury service.
Documentary series following members of the M-Sport World Rally Championship team as they face the trials and tribulations of competing in rally driving at the highest level.
The 2026 World Superbike Championship begins with the Australian Round as the 4.445km track at the Phillip Island Grand Prix Circuit pushes the riders to their limits.
Accident Alley: Nail-biting documentary series. Lisa Kelly follows veteran trucker Jack Jesse south down the Dalton Highway - and gets caught between an 18-wheeler and a hard place.
Hard-hitting action from AEW's newest show, featuring stars including Ricochet, Chris Jericho, Kris Statlander, Darby Allin and Claudio Castagnoli.
Jimmy Snuka and the Death of Nancy Argentino: Wrestling documentary series. A look at the story of Jimmy Snuka's girlfriend Nancy Argentino, who died in a motel room in 1983.
The Fugitive: Classic comedy-drama. The lads go off for a weekend of fishing in the country and meet up with a mysterious English hitchhiker.
Compelling whodunnit series. Something does not add up when Goodhap is discovered missing, and Shardlake refuses to compromise when Barak is agitated by the investigation's pace.
Your daily escape designed to calm the mind and encourage relaxation and reflection.
Shopping from home.
The latest news and reviews from the world of cars.
Shopping from home.
Brian Moore and Jim Rosenthal present highlights from April 1981 including Aston Villa v Leicester City, Norwich City v Manchester City, and Charlton Athletic v Huddersfield Town.
Brian Moore and Jim Rosenthal present football highlights from April 1981 including Aston Villa v Nottingham Forest at Villa Park and Crystal Palace v Brighton and Hove Albion.
All for One - Part One: The first part of a two-part episode of the classic US action drama series. Thomas sets out to rescue old friend JJ Quincannon from Cambodia with Rick.
Money Back Guarantee: Classic US detective drama. Theo discovers that a series of car thefts are part of a scam where victims let their cars be stolen so they can claim insurance.
Arms and the Dog: Classic drama. Ken and Harry are on the trail of an amateur boxer who has deserted from the Army and a champion greyhound that has disappeared from its kennel.
Thou Shalt Not Kill: Regan and Carter are called to a siege at a bank, where two armed robbers are holding hostages.
Silver Dollar: Classic detective series. Dempsey and Makepeace go downmarket when an isolated petrol station is attacked by masked raiders and a major company is blackmailed.
All for One - Part Two: The concluding part of a two-part episode of the classic US action drama series. Rick falls for a Vietnamese girl and considers taking her back to America.
A House of Prayer, A Den of Thieves: Classic US detective drama. Theo helps an old partner in Las Vegas who has arrested an elderly counterfeiter, but the crook is then murdered.
Sickness and Health: Classic drama. Things are not as they seem when a battered wife seeks refuge at Woodcote Park, and Harry investigates a spate of thefts at a nursing home.
Selected Target: DI Regan and his team search for a family held hostage while the father is forced to help a multi-million dollar fraud.
Back in Good Old England: Comedy-drama series. Terry's pleasure at seeing 'Oily' Wragg again is cut short by the appearance of some less friendly faces from the past.
Mad Dog: Australian spin-off from the popular US documentary series. The Pickers meet a passionate car collector and a couple who have been collecting together since their honeymoon.
Henry Cole loses sight of what he is bidding on when he heads solo to an automobilia and vintage toy auction, and the Junketeers try to come with enough cash for a 1950s Buick.
Bond film starring Sean Connery and Charles Gray, 1971. 007 pursues a case of diamond smuggling that is linked to a SPECTRE plot to destroy Washington, D.C. with a laser.
Latest news from the world of entertainment.
Bond film starring Sean Connery and Charles Gray, 1971. 007 pursues a case of diamond smuggling that is linked to a SPECTRE plot to destroy Washington, D.C. with a laser.
Jeremy Clarkson hosts the quiz where six players race to answer timed questions and hope to win one million pounds, but it all comes down to who's in the Hot Seat at the end.
Action from midweek fixtures in the Football League, including Millwall v Birmingham, Sheffield United v Coventry and Stoke v Oxford in the Championship.
